channel.title: Keeping HA nodes in sync (non k8s)
channel.description: I have multiple clusters and multiple nodes in each one. In the documentation it suggest keeping the packs and virutalenv in sync with something like Ansible but there's no suggestions on how one should do this. Any high-level suggestions on how to do this?
